flawed_nl_solution:
The hunting season last 12/4=<<12/4=3>>3 months
So he goes hunting 3*6=<<3*6=81>>81 times a year
That means he gets 81*2=<<81*2=162>>162 deers per year
So he catches 162*600=<<162*600=97200>>97200 pounds of deer a year
That means he keeps 97200/2=<<97200/2=48600>>48600 pounds of deer a year
#### 48600

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 18, not 81. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
